item.description:
ALERT! Americans needed to help show respect for our veterans this Memorial Day...

Rhode Island Oath Keepers will be showing respect for our Veterans in the Memorial Day parade in Charlestown RI on Monday May 28th, . Everyone is welcome and we would appreciate your support.  Rhode Island Oath Keepers will have a float with two "Founding Fathers" Oath Keeper banners, our new RI OK logo posters, American flags and bunting.  We will be marching/(walking) with a 7 foot OK tab banner and our new OK flag. All we need is you.   The respectful attire will consist of black pants and Oath Keepers dress shirts, T-shirts, hats, or black pants and a white shirt.  Oath Keepers gear will be available at the start.
Muster 7:45 a.m. at
Downey-Weaver Post 34
22 Whipple Dr., Charlestown, RI, 02813
secondary Muster 8:30 a.m. at
Richmond Carolina Fire Department
996 Main Street, Hopkinton, RI
the parade will end with a rifle ceremony by the memorial at the junction of Route 112 and Route 91,  After this event their will be refreshments served back at the American Legion Post 34 Charlestown as well as the Elks Lodge 60 Belmont St.  Wakefield. Any and everyone interested in marching, please sound off!  (Remember, America needs the Oath Keepers and the Oath Keepers need you to help Reach Teach and Inspire.)
item.how_to_find_us: The Rhode Island Oath Keepers parade float.
item.name: ALERT! Americans needed to help show respect for our Veterans this Memorial Day.
